entry.articleIntro: We are proud to see the launch of the Legatum Center at MIT’s Foundry Fellowship, an exciting and unique leadership programme for talented entrepreneurs based in Africa.

articleBlocks.text:
This programme allows founders at a crossroads in their journeys to re-ignite their passion for innovation by exploring pathways as entrepreneurs, policymakers, thought leaders and investors.

This learning journey culminates in a three-week in-person immersive programme in which Fellows will have the opportunity to engage with the MIT innovation ecosystem, meeting faculty and students alike.

The Legatum Center was founded in 2007 by Legatum with the belief that entrepreneurs and their market-driven solutions are critical to advancing economic and social progress in the developing world. Today, Legatum remains one of the Center’s key supporters alongside the Mastercard Foundation, HRH Princess Moudi Bint Khalid, and the Jacobs Foundation.

To apply or nominate an entrepreneur, please visit https://legatum.mit.edu/foundry-fellowship/

Nomination Deadline: 20/05/21

Application Deadline: 10/06/21
